info.title: PSC Filing API (Private)
info.description:
Private specification for the PSC Filings service (currently for PSC07 [Cease a PSC] only). Includes:
 * Public paths for use by third party software filers and 
* Private paths for CHS internal users.
---
 ### NOTE
Models include data properties required for any of PSC01 to PSC09, however most are currently unused.

PSC07 requires only
* `ceased_on`
* `register_entry-date`
* `reference_psc_id`
* `reference_etag`

tags.name: PSC Filing
tags.description: For creating, updating, and retrieving PSC filings

tags.name: Filing Data
tags.description: For use by the CHS filing resource handler service.

tags.name: Validation Status
tags.description: For public use and for the CHS transaction service when attempting to close a transaction.

403.description:
Forbidden 
* The authorization identity type must equal 'key' 
* The authenticated user account must have internal user privileges 
* The request must have an API key that has internal application privileges

transactionId.name: transactionId
transactionId.description: The current open transaction ID for the resource

pscType.name: pscType
pscType.description: The kind of PSC of the resource

filingResourceId.name: filingResourceId
filingResourceId.description: The unique filing ID of the resource

FilingNotFound.description: The filing resource could not be found. A filing having the specified combination of transaction ID, filing resource ID and PSC type does not exist.

NotFound.description:
The filing resource could not be found because of any of these conditions: 
* The transaction ID in the request path does not match an existing transaction or 
 * The filing ID in the request path does not match an existing PSC filing or 
* The combination of the transaction ID, filing resource ID and PSC type does not match an existing PSC filing.

Forbidden.description: The operation is not allowed or the resource's transaction is not in an open state.

CreateFilingBadRequest.description: The request to create a filing resource contained bad data.

errors.error: {rejected-value} must be a date in the past or in the present

scopes.https://account.companieshouse.gov.uk/us: Grants permission to read CHS User profile.
Grants permission to cease a PSC belonging to this company.
